name: @webreflection/element-observer
description: A MutationObserver inspired observer for Custom Elements like mutations on any DOM element

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:babel && npm run min && npm run test
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./; s/exports.default =/return/' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck

author: Andrea Giammarchi
